images.caption: Figure 1:Qualitative comparison of distillation methods.We visualize samples generated by the teacher (left) and the two student models at NFE={1, 2, 4}.sCMproduces structurally coherent images even at a single step. In contrast,MeanFlowexhibits generation collapse at NFE=1 (pure noise) and requires NFE=4 to converge to high-fidelity results.
